name: Chromatic (itch) (Pumpkiboo)
description:
**LEVEL 1 DEMO**

This is only a demo of the first level of my game. There will be four levels in total. I appreciate any feedback offered to me. Thank you for experiencing Chromatic.

Chromatic is a Roguelike adventure game following the player, a girl named Paige, as she experiences a nightmarish day at work when she accidentally dunks her mop in magic paint and brings a dark unfinished painting to life. Use the magical mop to battle enemies, bring items to life, and get the gallery cleaned up by morning -or you are going to get fired!
